name: Flying Bug Smasher
description:
Flying Bug Smasher: Smash a never-ending stream of bugs!

Three game modes to play
Infinite: Not timed; you can play as much as you want.
Timed: Play for 2, 5 or 10 minutes and see how much you can score
Level: Play from simple levels that start with one bug to progressive difficulty. How many can you finish without catching them all?

Play infinite number of levels with increasing difficulty
A non-timed mode for relaxed play (though a clock is shown to track time played)
Display user stats with high score
